{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-450 |revision=A1 |upc=790069298073 |ean= |asin=B000J5MZ1S |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/25/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DIR450A1 |ic_id=4216A-DIR450 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R3210-G |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064A90TFIR3 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6CH-75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit),USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Cameo WLG-1304 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2414 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:03:2F |oui_eth=00:19:5B }} The CardBus controller is a '''TI''' PCI1510.
The same hardware may also be used for the DIR-451.
